name: MC Dooda
body:
## GitHub projects

### MyMobADE
[MyMobADE](https://github.com/mcdooda/MyMobADE) provides a mobile-friendly access to ADE, a schedule software used in french universities.

### Luawie
[Luawie](https://github.com/mcdooda/luawie3) emulates mouse and keyboard input using Wii remotes.
Older versions can be found on [SourceForge](http://sourceforge.net/projects/luawie/).

### PiX
[PiX](https://github.com/mcdooda/PiX) is a picross-like game developed in Ruby.

### BayPHP
[BayPHP](https://github.com/mcdooda/BayPHP) is a PHP implementation of the [BayFiles](http://bayfiles.com) API.

### Sojourner
[Sojourner](https://github.com/mcdooda/Sojourner) is an experimental project of a game development framework.

### Lune
[Lune](https://github.com/mcdooda/lune) is an experimental scripting language.

## Other projects

### The Guinea Syndrome
[The Guinea Syndrome](http://code.google.com/p/things-get-serious/) (whose code name is Things Get Serious) is a platform game in which an unnamed rabbit has to reach the final carrot using the powers of famous video games heroes.

### The Global Scourge
[The Global Scourge](http://code.google.com/p/gammapersei/) (whose code name is Gamma Persei) is a real time strategy game in which our primary weapon is a mutating virus.

### ROFL
[ROFL](https://sourceforge.net/projects/rofl/) is a code name for my next video game project. It will be a Super Smash Bros.-like game including League of Legends heroes.
